SUMMARY:  INNER | FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD DETAIL:  FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD

com.gensym.jgi
Class G2ConnectionInfo

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.gensym.jgi.G2ConnectionInfo
public class G2ConnectionInfo
extends Object
implements Serializable

A Connection info object contains all the information necessary to get a handle on a specific instance of G2Access (actually G2Gateway). A G2ConnectionInfo object is used as the lookup into a collection of G2Access objects to determine which one matches the requirements of the requested connection. The match is performed by the match(G2ConnectionInfo other) method. This method can be overriden by subclasses to change the semantics of how a valid match is determined. Instances of G2ConnectionInfo are implicitly constructed by getOrMakeConnection in com.gensym.jgi.G2Gateway, com.gensym.rmi.G2RMIAccessBrokerImpl, and com.gensym.ntw.TwGateway

See Also:
com.gensym.jgi.G2Gateway#getOrMakeConnection(), matches(G2ConnectionInfo other), Serialized Form

Constructor Detail

G2ConnectionInfo

public G2ConnectionInfo()

G2ConnectionInfo

public G2ConnectionInfo(String hostName,
                        String portName)
Make a simple G2ConnectionInfo with minimal specifications as to what kind of connection it is.
Parameters:
hostName - the network name of the computer on which the desired G2 is running.
portName - the port number at which the G2 is listening for GSI connections (as a String).

G2ConnectionInfo

public G2ConnectionInfo(String hostName,
                        String portName,
                        boolean secure)
Make a simple G2ConnectionInfo with minimal specifications as to what kind of connection it is, allowing secure connection (on those platforms where security is supported).
Parameters:
hostName - the network name of the computer on which the desired G2 is running.
portName - the port number at which the G2 is listening for GSI connections (as a String).
secure - true to request SSL security, false otherwise.

G2ConnectionInfo

public G2ConnectionInfo(String brokerURL,
                        String hostName,
                        String portName)
Make a simple G2ConnectionInfo with minimal specifications as to what kind of connection it is.
Parameters:
brokerURL - applicable for a three-tier client: specifies the URL of the middle tier.
hostName - the network name of the computer on which the desired G2 is running.
portName - the port number at which the G2 is listening for GSI connections (as a String).

G2ConnectionInfo

public G2ConnectionInfo(String brokerURL,
                        String hostName,
                        String portName,
                        boolean forceNew,
                        boolean sharable)
Make a simple G2ConnectionInfo with minimal specifications as to what kind of connection it is.
Parameters:
brokerURL - applicable for a three-tier client: specifies the URL of the middle tier.
hostName - the network name of the computer on which the desired G2 is running.
portName - the port number at which the G2 is listening for GSI connections (as a String).
forceNew - set true to force a new connection, even if there is already a connection open that matches these settings
sharable - if true (default), the G2Connection created is allowed to be shared (i.e. getOrMakeConnection() will return the same open G2Connection if it's G2ConnectionInfo match).

G2ConnectionInfo

public G2ConnectionInfo(String brokerURL,
                        String hostName,
                        String portName,
                        String g2ConnectionClassName,
                        String gsiInterfaceClassName,
                        boolean forceNew,
                        boolean sharable)
Parameters:
brokerURL - applicable for a three-tier client: specifies the URL of the middle tier.
logicalName - allows application builders to associate a logical name with a specific combination of other parameters. This can be useful if the host and port for a given "logical g2" may change for some reason.
hostName - the network name of the computer on which the desired G2 is running.
portName - the port number at which the G2 is listening for GSI connections (as a String).
connectionClassName - the name of the Java class for the resulting connection. This Java class must implement com.gensym.jgi.G2Connection
gsiInterfaceClassName - the subclass of GSI-INTERFACE to be created to handle the connection from the G2 side.
forceNew - set true to force a new connection, even if there is already a connection open that matches these settings
sharable - if true (default), the G2Connection created is allowed to be shared (i.e. getOrMakeConnection() will return the same open G2Connection if its G2ConnectionInfo matches).

G2ConnectionInfo

public G2ConnectionInfo(String brokerURL,
                        String hostName,
                        String portName,
                        String g2ConnectionClassName,
                        String gsiInterfaceClassName)
Parameters:
brokerURL - applicable for a three-tier client: specifies the URL of the middle tier.
logicalName - allows application builders to associate a logical name with a specific combination of other parameters. This can be useful if the host and port for a given "logical g2" may change for some reason.
hostName - the network name of the computer on which the desired G2 is running.
portName - the port number at which the G2 is listening for GSI connections (as a String).
connectionClassName - the name of the Java class for the resulting connection. This Java class must implement com.gensym.jgi.G2Connection
gsiInterfaceClassName - the subclass of GSI-INTERFACE to be created to handle the connection from the G2 side.

G2ConnectionInfo

public G2ConnectionInfo(String brokerURL,
                        String logicalName,
                        String hostName,
                        String portName,
                        String connectionClassName,
                        String gsiInterfaceClassName,
                        String interfaceName,
                        String protocol,
                        Boolean isPerm,
                        String rpis)
Full featured constructor for exact specifications of all aspects of the connection, excepting forceNew and sharable.
Parameters:
brokerURL - applicable for a three-tier client: specifies the URL of the middle tier.
logicalName - allows application builders to associate a logical name with a specific combination of other parameters. This can be useful if the host and port for a given "logical g2" may change for some reason.
hostName - the network name of the computer on which the desired G2 is running.
portName - the port number at which the G2 is listening for GSI connections (as a String).
connectionClassName - the name of the Java class for the resulting connection. This Java class must implement com.gensym.jgi.G2Connection
gsiInterfaceClassName - the subclass of GSI-INTERFACE to be created to handle the connection from the G2 side.
interfaceName - the name given to the instance of GSI-INTERFACE
protocol - only "GSI" and "RMI" are supported at the moment.
isPerm - is the connection to be permananent (usually true)
rpis - Remote Procedure Identification String.

G2ConnectionInfo

public G2ConnectionInfo(String brokerURL,
                        String logicalName,
                        String hostName,
                        String portName,
                        String connectionClassName,
                        String gsiInterfaceClassName,
                        String interfaceName,
                        String protocol,
                        Boolean isPerm,
                        String rpis,
                        boolean forceNew,
                        boolean sharable)
Constructor for backwards compatibility from before we introduced secure.
Parameters:
brokerURL - applicable for a three-tier client: specifies the URL of the middle tier.
logicalName - allows application builders to associate a logical name with a specific combination of other parameters. This can be useful if the host and port for a given "logical g2" may change for some reason.
hostName - the network name of the computer on which the desired G2 is running.
portName - the port number at which the G2 is listening for GSI connections (as a String).
connectionClassName - the name of the Java class for the resulting connection. This Java class must implement com.gensym.jgi.G2Connection
gsiInterfaceClassName - the subclass of GSI-INTERFACE to be created to handle the connection from the G2 side.
interfaceName - the name given to the instance of GSI-INTERFACE
protocol - only "GSI" and "RMI" are supported at the moment.
isPerm - is the connection to be permananent (usually true)
rpis - Remote Procedure Identification String.
forceNew - set true to force a new connection, even if there is already a connection open that matches these settings
sharable - if true (default), the G2Connection created is allowed to be shared (i.e. getOrMakeConnection() will return the same open G2Connection if its G2ConnectionInfo matches).

G2ConnectionInfo

public G2ConnectionInfo(String brokerURL,
                        String logicalName,
                        String hostName,
                        String portName,
                        String connectionClassName,
                        String gsiInterfaceClassName,
                        String interfaceName,
                        String protocol,
                        Boolean isPerm,
                        String rpis,
                        boolean forceNew,
                        boolean sharable,
                        boolean secure)
Full featured constructor for exact specifications of all aspects of the connection.
Parameters:
brokerURL - applicable for a three-tier client: specifies the URL of the middle tier.
logicalName - allows application builders to associate a logical name with a specific combination of other parameters. This can be useful if the host and port for a given "logical g2" may change for some reason.
hostName - the network name of the computer on which the desired G2 is running.
portName - the port number at which the G2 is listening for GSI connections (as a String).
connectionClassName - the name of the Java class for the resulting connection. This Java class must implement com.gensym.jgi.G2Connection
gsiInterfaceClassName - the subclass of GSI-INTERFACE to be created to handle the connection from the G2 side.
interfaceName - the name given to the instance of GSI-INTERFACE
protocol - only "GSI" and "RMI" are supported at the moment.
isPerm - is the connection to be permananent (usually true)
rpis - Remote Procedure Identification String.
forceNew - set true to force a new connection, even if there is already a connection open that matches these settings
sharable - if true (default), the G2Connection created is allowed to be shared (i.e. getOrMakeConnection() will return the same open G2Connection if it's G2ConnectionInfo match).
secure - if true, the G2Connection created will use SSL encryption to write to the G2 connection. Not available in 3-tier mode. Not available on all platforms
Method Detail

initialize

protected void initialize()
Called by the constructor to determine internal consistency and fill in certain defaults. The main consistency check currently performed is brokerURL/protocol consistency: A null brokerURL implies the GSI_PROTOCOL, while a non-null brokerURL implies the RMI_PROTOCOL.

hashCode

public int hashCode()
Returns a cached hashcode based on all the string variables in the G2ConnectionInfo object.
Overrides:
hashCode in class Object

equals

public boolean equals(Object obj)
A field by field match of two G2ConnectionInfo objects of the same class.
Overrides:
equals in class Object

matches

public boolean matches(G2ConnectionInfo other)
Does a match based on all the string variables and returns true if all of those "match" using compareWithNulls(Object, Object, Object), false otherwise. Not strictly true: if the logicalName is non-null for both G2ConnectionInfo objects, then if the logicalNames match, it returns true without checking the other fields.
See Also:
, #compareConnectionClassNames()

getBrokerURL

public String getBrokerURL()
The URL to the remote rmiregistry. Used in a three-tier connection using RMI

Allows applications to specify a logical name that represents a (possibly changing) specific combination of the other variables.

getSecure

getConnectionClassName

public String getConnectionClassName()
Specifies what class the actual connection to G2 should be. Currently does no internal verification that this is a valid class, but it is recommended that this be at least an implementation of com.gensym.jgi.G2Access, and most likely a subclass of com.gensym.jgi.G2Gateway

getGsiInterfaceClassName

public String getGsiInterfaceClassName()
This is the name of the GSI-INTERFACE subclass to be used for the connection within G2.

getGsiInterfaceName

public String getGsiInterfaceName()
This is the name of the GSI-INTERFACE instance to be used for the connection within G2.

getInterfaceName

compareWithNulls

public static final boolean compareWithNulls(Object localValue,
                                             Object otherValue,
                                             Object defaultValue)
Returns true if localValue.equals(otherValue) where a null value for otherValue are treated as matching with defaultValue, while a null value for localValue automatically return true.

compareWithNulls

public static final boolean compareWithNulls(Object localValue,
                                             Object otherValue)
Utility field comparator for .equals(). Returns true if localValue.equals(otherValue) or if both are null.
